section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This order may be cited as the Designation of Museums Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Designation of museums
section.content: The buildings, parts of buildings or places in the Schedule are designated as museums.

section.name: s1
section.content: Hong Kong Museum of Art (excluding the Lecture Hall, the Ceramic Studio, the Painting Studio, the Printmaking Studio, the Lobby and the Podium on 1/F set aside for use as a civic centre under section 105M of the Ordinance), at 10 Salisbury Road, Tsim Sha Tsui.

section.name: s2
section.content: Hong Kong Museum of History, Block 58, Kowloon Park, Haiphong Road, Tsim Sha Tsui.

section.name: s3
section.content: Hong Kong Museum of History (excluding the Lecture Hall, Activity Rooms 1 and 2, the Special Exhibition Gallery and the Courtyard set aside for use as a civic centre under section 105M of the Ordinance), 100 Chatham Road South, Tsim Sha Tsui.

section.name: s4
section.content: Lei Cheng Uk Han Tomb Museum, 41 Tonkin Street, Sham Shui Po.

section.name: s5
section.content: Hong Kong Space Museum (excluding the Space Museum Lecture Hall), Salisbury Road, Tsim Sha Tsui.

section.name: s6
section.content: Sheung Yiu Folk Museum, Sai Kung.

section.name: s7
section.content: Hong Kong Railway Museum, Tai Po Market, Tai Po.

section.name: s8
section.content: Flagstaff House Museum of Tea Ware (excluding the Tea Room, Galleries 1, 2 and 3 and the North Lawn set aside for use as a civic centre under section 105M of the Ordinance), 10 Cotton Tree Drive, Central.

section.name: s9
section.content: Sam Tung Uk Museum, Tsuen Wan.

section.name: s10
section.content: Law Uk Folk Museum, 14, Kut Shing Street, Chai Wan.

section.name: s11
section.content: Hong Kong Science Museum (excluding the Lecture Hall and the Special Exhibition Hall set aside for use as a civic centre under section 105M of the Ordinance), 2 Science Museum Road, Tsim Sha Tsui East.

section.name: s12
section.content: Hong Kong Heritage Museum (excluding the Theatre, the Seminar Room, the Education Studio, the Function Place, the Courtyard and the Main Foyer (including the Grand Staircase) set aside for use as a civic centre under section 105M of the Ordinance), 1 Man Lam Road, Sha Tin.

section.name: s13
section.content: Hong Kong Museum of the War of Resistance and Coastal Defence, Shau Kei Wan. (L.N. 76 of 2024)

section.name: s14
section.content: Hong Kong Film Archive (excluding Cinema and Exhibition Hall set aside for use as a civic centre under section 105M of the Ordinance), 50 Lei King Road, Sai Wan Ho.

section.name: s15
section.content: Hong Kong Heritage Discovery Centre, Blocks S61 and S62 (together with the extension block connecting those two blocks but excluding the Lecture Hall in the extension block, the Activity Room in Block S62 and the Courtyard and Cafeteria between Blocks S61 and S62 set aside for use as a civic centre under section 105M of the Ordinance), Kowloon Park, Haiphong Road, Tsim Sha Tsui.

section.name: s16
section.content: Dr Sun Yat-sen Museum (the building and the courtyard) at No. 7 Castle Road, Central.

section.name: s17
section.content: Ping Shan Tang Clan Gallery cum Heritage Trail Visitors Centre, Hang Tau Tsuen, Ping Shan, Yuen Long.

section.name: s18
section.content: Fireboat Alexander Grantham Exhibition Gallery, Quarry Bay Park.
